item.description:
Hi Surf Ladies and those hoping to learn,

If you need some new or used surf gear, this is great opportunity to get some deals, a free surf camp voucher and, most importantly, good advice on the best equipment for you.

Cinnamon Rainbows is one of New England's best surf shops and this is a great opportunity to get deals and loads of honest advice on a huge selection of surf equipment. Or just gather info for when you're ready to take the plunge.

DEALS
*10% off all wetsuits and clothing.
* Discounts on new surfboards.
* A good selection of used surfboards from $199 - $499.
* Everyone will receive a FREE voucher for their women's surf camp

Tell all your lady friends (sorry guys!). Hope to see you there!

Courtney

Just FYI, this event is being "co-sponsored" by my women's surf community Ceto Surf but there's no fee or any payment going to Ceto. Just a good time. www.CetoSurf.com
item.name: Ladies Night at Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop
